question_description: On the Cloture Motion: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to H.R. 6867; A bill to provide for additional emergency unemployment compensation.

No. 4419; To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the limited continuation of clean energy production incentives and incentives to improve energy efficiency in order to prevent a downturn in these sectors that would result from a lapse in the tax law.
